tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came in to Smile Sensations for a root canal capping since the old one fell off and also for tartar removal. It was Dr. Cinderella who worked things out like a smooth operator. She totally knows what she needs to do and is also very sweet and humble at the same time. She explained each and every step and kept me prepared for what's next.Iam very Happy with the overall result of the capping and the way my teeth look now without the tartar..Thank you Doc..**** *** *** **** *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment, Teeth cleaning & polishing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Cavity Filling,
review: This is a little late review but just had to mention I had a very pleasant experience in terms of treatment, clearing doubts, cleanliness,etc. All in all it was a good experience after a really long time and would definitely recommend this clinic and Dr. Hardik

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had a very satisfying and fruitful experience, being treated by Dr. Hardik Shah.. The consultation was prompt.. Appointments were given as per convenience.. Treatment plan was discussed in a very lucid and understandable language.. Quite happy with the treatment process and the results..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental X-Ray,Broken Teeth,Surgical Extractions of Teeth,
review: It was a pleasant experience.** ******  ***** ** ** ********* ********!Very thorough and caring and highly  professional, explens all the procedure, with step by step instructions.No pain or problems with my extractions and he goes above and beyond the call of duty to make sure you understand every detail.They called me twice to make sure I was comfortable after the treatment and had not developed any problems. They truly care about their patients. ”

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Hardik has been my family's doctor for nearly 15 years which itself says that he is the best . All through the Covid  lockdown too he took care of my severe dental issues via the phone .

Very peaceful ,clean and well sanitized clinic with very courteous staff .

 Pain free dental care, courteousness, respectful, extremely professional and total transparency in explaining the treatment procedures .

 It is honest Doctors like Dr Hardik that makes one equate Doctors to God.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: The doctor before proceeding with treatment gives an entire overview of the situation and asks for patients opinion on whether he/she wants to proceed. He gives the approximate costs that would be incurred to complete the process.. he is very professional too and also puts patients at ease.

Overall she was great.
